title: American Hats (US)
desc:
Change the police hats (112 Operator assets) and the fire hats to the default 911 Operator hats. This mod will only effect US towns/cities and may not function correctly if installed with other mods that also change US hats.

-- Mod by Soharic. Visit www.soharicmedia.com/112/hat-mods#canadian-hats for more information.
